title: Here's to extremes and my journey beyond
creator_credit: Kim Davis, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: All her life, Kim Davis believed she could do anything. And she still does, despite the efforts of society or even fate. From a line of strong women, she refuses to let anything beat her and is determined to help others.
